column3: News;Phnom Penh: A body of a foreign male was pulled from the river near ------Preah Phatong pumping station in Sangkat Chey Chor
column5: ------Phnom Penh Municipal Court at 7.15am on Thursday.------According to local police reports
column9: about 50 years old.------Police said that before the incident
column10: the fishermen went out to catch fish near the scene
column11: and they saw the floating body------They dragged it by the river bank and then reported to the local police and competent police officers for examination.------Police decided the deceased foreigner died from drowning.------Warning- Graphic images------
